Name: Courier services
description: This syndicated contract offers domestic and international courier services at competitive courier rates.

Name: Commercial household goods and appliances
description: This contract covers the provision of household goods and appliances including whiteware, televisions, small kitchen appliances, microwaves, stereos and AV cables.

Name: Bulk ground fuel
description: This contract covers bulk fuel (91, 95, 98 octane petrol and automotive diesel) delivered onsite to agency storage facilities.

Name: Legislation services
description: This contract covers specialised legislative drafting and related services to participating agencies.

Name: Amazon Web Services Cloud Services Agreement
description: The Amazon Web Services Cloud Services Agreement (ACSA) is a new Department of Internal Affairs AoG agreement that covers Amazon Web Services (AWS) public cloud and professional services.

Name: Rental vehicles
description: The general rentals and commercial rentals categories include nationwide rental vehicle providers and discounted fixed daily rates to ensure agencies continue to achieve the best possible value.
LeadAgency: Ministry of Business, Innovation and Employment

Name: GCDO assurance services panel
description: A panel of 26 providers who specialise in the provision of Independent Quality Assurance (IQA) and Technical Quality Assurance (TQA) services for digital investments.
LeadAgency: Ministry of Business, Innovation and Employment

Name: Reticulated gas
description: The All-of-Government contract facilitates the supply of reticulated gas to participating agencies at a competitive market-aligned gas rate. Reticulated natural gas is distributed via pipelines in the North Island only.
LeadAgency: Ministry of Business, Innovation and Employment

Name: External recruitment services
description: ​This contract offers a comprehensive range of benefits for the most common types of New Zealand government recruitment.
LeadAgency: Ministry of Business, Innovation and Employment

Name: Air travel services
description: An All-of-Government panel of 12 air travel services suppliers representing 15 airlines offer agencies extensive coverage to most corners of the globe.
LeadAgency: Ministry of Business, Innovation and Employment

Name: Retail fuel
description: This contract covers extensive nationwide distribution channels for retail fuel.

Name: Workplace and classroom furniture
description: This contract covers workplace and classroom furniture and related services including seating, tables, workstation accessories, furniture maintenance, repair, refurbishment, planning and design, and delivery.
LeadAgency: Ministry of Business, Innovation and Employment

Name: Marine fuel
description: This contract covers fuel provision at international ports and bulk fuel storage facilities through specific arrangements between the agency and supplier.

Name: IaaS (Infrastructure as a Service)
description: IaaS is a vendor hosted and managed solution that allows agencies to buy their ICT infrastructure on demand.

Name: Fleet management services
description: This contract covers scheduled and non-scheduled servicing, tyre and brake management, and mechanical repairs to vehicles, trailers and motorcycles.

Name: Desktop as a Service (DaaS)
description: Desktop as a Service (DaaS) is a provider hosted and managed end-to-end desktop service with options that accommodate virtual and traditional desktops and a variety of service and management models.

Name: Data cabling - project work
description: This contract covers data cabling for project work as part of the cabling panel.

Name: Catering equipment and supplies
description: The contract covers the provision of catering equipment and supplies ranging from crockery, cutlery, glassware, tableware, knives, cookware and utensils, bakery, barware and more.

Name: Accident management services
description: This contract covers the provision of round-the-clock 0800 call out service for reporting accidents, and more.

Name: SAP cloud framework agreement
description: The SAP cloud framework agreement (CFA) provides a pan-government contract that allows eligible government agencies to buy SAP cloud software and professional services under standardised terms.

Name: Face to face interpreting services
description: This contract covers face to face interpreting in a range of languages, including Te Reo Māori and New Zealand Sign Language.
LeadAgency: Ministry of Business, Innovation and Employment

Name: PEPPOL capabilities and associated services (including e-Invoicing)
description: This contract covers the provision of PEPPOL capabilities and associated services, allowing the adoption of a standard approach to e-Invoicing.
LeadAgency: Ministry of Business, Innovation and Employment

Name: Construction consultancy services
description: The All-of-Government (AoG) construction consultancy services (CCS) solution gives eligible agencies access to a panel of providers that offer specialist advice. It replaces the syndicated agreement that was led by the Department of Corrections for construction consultancy services.
LeadAgency: Ministry of Business, Innovation and Employment

Name: Facial recognition as-a-service
description: This contract covers the supply of facial recognition under an as-a-service construct.

Name: Travel management services
description: An All-of-Government panel of five nationwide travel management providers with services designed to meet participating agencies' business travel requirements.
LeadAgency: Ministry of Business, Innovation and Employment

Name: Protective security services sub-panel
description: The Protective security services sub-panel is a risk based protective security framework which provides holistic protective security policies and guidance for agencies.
LeadAgency: Ministry of Business, Innovation and Employment

Name: Media
description: An All-of-Government panel of 19 suppliers offering discounted advertising rates across television, radio, print, digital, out of home, and cinema channels, with the ability to add emerging media.
LeadAgency: Ministry of Business, Innovation and Employment

Name: Print technology and associated services
description: The All-of-Government (AoG) print technology and associated services (PTAS) contract covers printers/copiers/scanners and associated services.
LeadAgency: Ministry of Business, Innovation and Employment

Name: Consultancy services
description: This All-of-Government contract offers specialist consultancy advice and competitive solutions from a panel of experienced consultancy providers across 11 sub-categories.
LeadAgency: Ministry of Business, Innovation and Employment

Name: Advertising services
description: An All-of-Government panel of 136 providers offering client services, creative and production, and media services across print, broadcast, digital, out-of-home, and emerging media.
LeadAgency: Ministry of Business, Innovation and Employment

Name: Media monitoring
description: A panel contract for media monitoring covering five categories: print media, broadcast media, online media, social media; and reporting evaluation and analytical services.
LeadAgency: Ministry of Business, Innovation and Employment

Name: External print and associated services
description: This contract covers pre-print and print services, warehousing/storage of printed materials, mail-house services, and digital asset management.

Name: Data publishing
description: Intelligent data service for New Zealand government agencies to publish geospatial/GIS, tabular and document data online.

Name: Tailored cleaning services
description: This nationwide contract covers access to a comprehensive range of cleaning services capable of being tailored to meet an agency’s specific requirements. The supplier is Spotless.

Name: Agile logistics
description: The contract covers a range of services including consultancy and independent partnering, maintenance and repair and overhaul services, warehousing and operational rations.

Name: Catalyst cloud framework agreement
description: The Catalyst cloud framework agreement is an all-of-government agreement that covers catalyst cloud’s public cloud services and professional services.

Name: Telephone and video interpreting services
description: Telephone and video interpreting services enables participating agencies to purchase on demand telephone and video interpreting services available 24/7.
LeadAgency: Ministry of Business, Innovation and Employment

Name: Supply of rations
description: This contract covers the provision of rations and related support services. The supplier is Bidfood Limited.

Name: Facilities management services
description: A panel of facilities management services providers who can deliver a range of management, technical and non-technical services to eligible government agencies.
LeadAgency: Ministry of Business, Innovation and Employment

Name: Motor vehicles
description: The All-of-Government (AoG) motor vehicles contract provides fit-for-purpose, safe vehicles, including electric vehicles (EVs), at the lowest possible total cost of ownership across the life of the vehicle.
LeadAgency: Ministry of Business, Innovation and Employment

Name: Electricity
description: The All-of-Government electricity contract covers the supply of electricity and associated services.
LeadAgency: Ministry of Business, Innovation and Employment

Name: Waste management services
description: This contract covers office waste and recycling including general waste, recyclable materials, batteries, and furniture.

Name: Telecommunications as a Service
description: TaaS delivers a range of cross-government network, telecommunications and managed security services.

Name: Personal duress and safety alarms and monitoring
description: Personal duress alarm and monitoring solutions to address the risk of harm to staff when they are carrying out business outside of agency premises.

Name: Lubricants
description: A panel contract for oils, lubricants, hydraulic fluids, and coolants. The contract also provides for other related services including training.

Name: HRIS - Software Solution
description: Human Resources Information System (HRIS) offers a cloud-based suite of tools to manage and analyse employee records and automate HR processes.

Name: First aid training and related services
description: This contract covers the provision of first aid training and related services for agency staff.

Name: Employee health management services
description: This is a group of panels contracted to deliver Employee Health Management Services.

Name: Oracle software framework agreement
description: The Oracle software framework agreement is an all-of-government contract that allows eligible government agencies to buy new software licences, cloud services and appliances from Oracle under standardised terms.

Name: Carbon emission reduction programme
description: This Letter of Offer includes preferential government pricing for Toitū carbonreduce: a carbon emission reduction programme to measure, manage and reduce carbon emissions.

Name: Kauri dieback cleaning stations fabricators
description: This contract covers the supply of Kauri dieback cleaning stations.

Name: Residential relocation and storage services
description: This contract covers the supply of residential relocation and storage services (domestic and international). This contract does not cover office relocation services.

Name: Microsoft cloud, software and service agreement (MCSSA)
description: The Microsoft Cloud, Software and Services Agreement (MCSSA) is a cross-government Microsoft volume licensing agreement that includes subscription-based, perpetual, and cloud services licensing.

Name: ​Office supplies
description: The All-of-Government office supplies contract covers stationery, cleaning, hygiene and washroom consumables, ICT consumables, educational supplies, health and safety products, and milk and milk alternatives.
LeadAgency: Ministry of Business, Innovation and Employment

Name: Risk financing and insurance
description: Specialist insurance management, advisory and broking services from an All-of-Government panel of risk financing and insurance intermediaries.
LeadAgency: Ministry of Business, Innovation and Employment

Name: IT hardware
description: The All-of-Government IT hardware contract covers a wide range of products including desktops, laptops, tablets, thin clients, monitors, peripherals, Chromebooks, mobile phones, meeting room equipment and associated services.
LeadAgency: Ministry of Business, Innovation and Employment

Name: Banking services
description: An All-of-Government panel of five banking services providers covering Crown Transactional banking services, foreign exchange services, payment services, and card services.
LeadAgency: Ministry of Business, Innovation and Employment

Name: External legal services
description: ​An All-of-Government panel of 30 providers who provide legal services in nine areas of law, including banking and finance, employment, and property law.
LeadAgency: Ministry of Business, Innovation and Employment

Name: Vehicle booking and fleet management
description: A contract for a fleet management booking tool to increase efficiency and cost savings.

Name: Property consultancy services
description: Experienced providers across seven sub-categories with the capacity, capability and expertise to deliver quality, value for money property consultancy services. The contract scope is intended for office accommodation, but may be useful in operational property settings too.
LeadAgency: Ministry of Business, Innovation and Employment

Name: Offsite document storage and destruction of records services
description: This contract covers the provision of off-site storage and destruction of records.

Name: Data cabling - small works
description: The contract covers data cabling for small works (small jobs and business-as-usual work) as part of the cabling panel.

Name: Scheduled cleaning services
description: This nationwide contract covers scheduled cleaning services. The supplier is OCS.

Name: Aviation fuel
description: This contract covers purchase, delivery and disposal of aviation fuel.

Name: Design services
description: An All-of-Government contract with a panel of 84 providers offering services design strategy and production, as well as project, account and relationship management.
LeadAgency: Ministry of Business, Innovation and Employment
